# PII Test Data Fixture
# Contains patterns that should be detected by PII scanner

# Social Security Numbers
Customer SSN: 123-45-6789
Employee SSN: 987-65-4321
Legacy format: 111-22-3333

# Phone Numbers (various formats)
Contact: (555) 123-4567
Mobile: 555-987-6543
Office: 555.111.2222
International: +1 555 123 4567

# Credit Card Numbers (test patterns)
Visa: 4111-1111-1111-1111
Mastercard: 5500 0000 0000 0004
Amex: 378282246310005

# IP Addresses
Server: 192.168.1.100
Gateway: 10.0.0.1
Public: 8.8.8.8
External: 203.0.113.50

# Email Addresses
Contact: user@example.com
Admin: admin@company.com

# Street Addresses
123 Main Street, Anytown, CA 90210
456 Oak Avenue, Suite 100, Springfield, IL 62701
